In part 2, we'll introduce (or review) many of the basic data management tools and coding you'll need throughout the class.

## Objectives
- Get (more) comfortable with `R`, `RStudio`, `Git`, and `GitHub`
- Work with some Medicare Advantage data

## Activities 
- Data manipulation with the `tidyverse`
- First [weekly check-in](/assignment/weekly-check-in.html) due on Friday.
- Clone [Medicare Advantage repository](https://github.com/imccart-test/ma) and begin working with data
